ygData.subject: The Vile Forces boss and a possible new weapon.

Some point way in the future in the Vile Force reality... An odd 
looking yellow humanoid alien walks into a secret X-Predacon research 
facility in the main X-Predacon base. As he does a scientist turns to 
him, the alien having dark lines under his eyes. The X-Predacon 
scientist pays him no mind and looks over a monitor displaying 
various data on the Violator. The Alien taps the X-Predacon scientist 
who we shall call Mindmurderer for the duration, causing him to 
flinch the alien then turns to him and looks at him oddly.

Alien named Rabalba: "You Mindmurderer." The alien twitches.

MindMurderer: "Yes, that is me... who are you?"

The alien holds his hand out for a handshake but then moves it away 
once it starts shaking alot on its own.

Rabalba: "Rabbalabababa." The alien twitches some more.

Mindmurderer gives Rabalba an odd look and backs away slowly.

Rabalba: "I have some things, to show you" 

The alien nods his head rapidly and sets a metallic brief case on a 
table in front of Mindmurderer before twitching again.

Mindmurderer: "Just what is this?"

Rabalba: "Just take a look. Inside. For yourself. Please."

Mindmurderer quirks a brow at the odd alien and then begins to open 
the briefcase.

Rabalba: "Yes, inside. Go on, Look. have a look. Please." He twitches 
again.

Mindmurderer picks up the briefcase and moves it away from Quatre
and looks inside, and sees just a stale half eaten donut, an apple 
core, and a sandwhich still in a glad bag.

Mindripper: "Uhh... Interesting..."

Rabalba: "Oh! Mistake." he twitches again before taking a folded 
paper bage from his vest pocket.

Mindmurderer looks inside the brown paper bag, and finds some blue
prints, and a CD.

MindMurderer: "A defense system that will enable a charachter to 
negate most long range and melee weapons?" 

Rabalba: "Yes! Yes, Yes.. Zero System, read all about it!"
He twitches again. "In the CD! Not the bag."

Mindmurdere nods, as rabalba twitches again, and he inserts the CD
in a panel, and starts going over the data.

Mindmurderer: ""These findings.. Are pretty incredible. The Source?"

Rabalba: "For me to forget and you to hope for..."

MindMurder starts geetting annoyed.

MindMurderer: "Just what is it that you want from me!?"

Rabalba: "Data swap! My disc for your disc! My lunch for your
lunch! Someone sat on my sandwich, then this mix up happened.. And 
the funnel disk is in the sandwhich bag.. And well, you saw..." he 
pauses. "Please." and then twitches once again.

Mindmurderer: "As soon as we are done investigating this Infecticon 
probe I will give you the information."

Rabalba nods and then picks up the apple core from the briefcase and 
then tosses it into the paper bag. He then twitches a final time 
before leaving.


(note the following was taken directly from another RPG but fits in 
with this setting somewhat. THings have been edited and chaged so 
dont blame me for certain things that are said in here. If anyone 
takes offense to any part of the rest of this post I am apologizing 
ahead of time.)
Elsewhere a huge chubby robot named Cartman, another skinneir one 
wearing a green and red hat named Stan, and Gigatron all walk with a 
bunch of guards towards the glass tube connecting two portions of the 
complex. Cartman hops in front of the group before they can really 
enter the tunnel, his bulk preventing their advance.

Cartman: "So, that's why he was all like, I'm not coming to the
meeting. Please, and twitchitching and shaking, and talking like the 
little fag(no offense to anyone. heh just the way cartman talks on 
South Park.) he is and all. So I was like, "don't tell me not to sit 
on your damn sandwhich, or I'll kick you in the
nuts!"

Stan: "Gee, I'm sure that scared him straight Cartman."

Gigatron: "Yes, very progress inspiring.. Now will you stop blocking 
the way?"

Cartman: "Yeah, I was all in his face. Telling him about the
progress and all that. I was telling him, like, "Hey! You better 
start pumping out at least ten ships a week, and, and get off the 
damn drugs, and like, stop, before I kick you in the nuts!"

Stan: "Dammit cartman, move your fat ass!"

Cartman: "Hey! Don't call me fat!"

Gigatron: "Forward progress.. More of it.."

Cartman: "Oh! Right! Sorry!"

Finally Cartman moves and the three enter the tunnel, heading of to 
the reasearch facility Rabalba was just in...
